name: Jam snake
description:
A game where you control a snake.
Get to the purple star to win.
This game has been rushed and is very lacking in content, although playable.
The theme "only one" was supposed to be realized by only being able to step on a tile once since your snake body would block it later. 

Be cautious of clicking with your mouse in the game window, a mistake of mine left the level editor code enabled. You can play with it if you want, but since the game lacks any depth, it isn't worth it at all.
